reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 373/23: AMOUNTS TO BE EXCLUDED FROM RATES
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 373/23: AMOUNTS TO BE EXCLUDED FROM RATES

content.section: Amounts to be excluded from gas rates
content.content: 1. For the purposes of paragraph 2 of subsection 36 (3.1) of the Act, the Board shall not include any of the following amounts in approving or fixing just and reasonable rates for the sale, transmission or distribution of gas: 1. Any award, damages or penalty a gas transmitter or gas distributor is required to pay under an agreement entered into under section 51 of the Building Transit Faster Act, 2020 or an order made under section 68 of that Act. 2. Compensation a gas transmitter or gas distributor is required to pay to Metrolinx, as determined under section 69 of the Building Transit Faster Act, 2020.
content.raw_html:
1. For the purposes of paragraph 2 of subsection 36 (3.1) of the Act, the Board shall not include any of the following amounts in approving or fixing just and reasonable rates for the sale, transmission or distribution of gas:

1. Any award, damages or penalty a gas transmitter or gas distributor is required to pay under an agreement entered into under section 51 of the Building Transit Faster Act, 2020 or an order made under section 68 of that Act.

2. Compensation a gas transmitter or gas distributor is required to pay to Metrolinx, as determined under section 69 of the Building Transit Faster Act, 2020.

content.section: Amounts to be excluded from electricity rates
content.content:
2. For the purposes of paragraph 2 of subsection 78 (5) of the Act, the Board shall not include any of the following amounts in approving or fixing just and reasonable rates for the transmission or distribution of electricity: 1. Any award, damages or penalty a transmitter or distributor is required to pay under an agreement entered into under section 51 of the Building Transit Faster Act, 2020
or an order made under section 68 of that Act. 2. Compensation a transmitter or distributor is required to pay to Metrolinx, as determined under section 69 of the Building Transit Faster Act, 2020.
content.raw_html:
2. For the purposes of paragraph 2 of subsection 78 (5) of the Act, the Board shall not include any of the following amounts in approving or fixing just and reasonable rates for the transmission or distribution of electricity:

1. Any award, damages or penalty a transmitter or distributor is required to pay under an agreement entered into under section 51 of the Building Transit Faster Act, 2020 or an order made under section 68 of that Act.

2. Compensation a transmitter or distributor is required to pay to Metrolinx, as determined under section 69 of the Building Transit Faster Act, 2020.

content.section: Amounts to be excluded from electricity rates
content.content: 3.  Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3.  Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).

content.section: Amounts to be excluded from electricity rates
